name: Aidsmoji: The Forbidden Fruit
description: Alright boys and girls, this is Aidsmoji aka the best game in the whole world. You know my grandparents always told me 'Common sense is genius dressed in his bath' and that's why I decided to make this game. In this master piece, you play as Steve, the eccentric young entrepreneur with a penchant for coin collecting and cereals. You must intimidate Jonny and Esky, all their suffering is up to you! Get ready for the ride of a lifetime through the world of Aidsmoji!
